title: Episode 35: A Trader Joe's Shopping List to Liven Up Your Spring Eating
itunes:title: A Trader Joe's Shopping List to Liven Up Your Spring Eating
description:
Spring is just around the corner, and while some focus on spring cleaning, we instead focus on our favorite seasonal activity, spring eating. (Actually, that's our favorite activity every season.) There are new products arriving in our stores every day, from sweet treats like Chocolate & Peanut Butter Joe Joe's to savory delights like Oven Baked Cheese Bites with Tomato and Chili. In this episode of Inside Trader Joe's, we present a baker's dozen of our new favorites that are sure to put a spring in your step.

Transcript (PDF)
